code: import api from'./api';export const taskService={getAllTasks:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/tasks/');return response.data;},getTask:async id=>{const response=await api.get("/tasks/".concat(id));return response.data;},createTask:async taskData=>{const response=await api.post('/tasks/',taskData);return response.data;},updateTask:async(id,taskData)=>{const response=await api.put("/tasks/".concat(id),taskData);return response.data;},deleteTask:async id=>{await api.delete("/tasks/".concat(id));}};
